snippet.title: Plague Inc: Evolved for Nintendo Switch - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
This is the official launch trailer for Plague Inc: Evolved on Nintendo Switch - developed by Ndemic Creations.

Can you infect the world? Your pathogen has just infected 'Patient Zero'. Now you must bring about the end of human history by evolving a deadly, global Plague whilst adapting against everything humanity can do to defend itself. 

Plague Inc: Evolved is a unique mix of high strategy and terrifyingly realistic simulation which has evolved onto Nintendo Switch. Plague Inc: Evolved combines the original critically acclaimed gameplay of Plague Inc. on mobile with significant, all-new features for Nintendo Switch.

More information here: http://www.plagueinc.com/console

For updates and news - follow us!
Twitter - https://twitter.com/NdemicCreations
Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/PlagueInc
